```{r langarts_libaries, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(pander)
library(ggplot2)
library(sqldf)
library(psych)
library(knitr)
library(gridExtra)
library(effsize)
library(likert)
library(getREAL)

```


```{r langarts_db, echo=FALSE}

setwd("C:/Users/kevin/Dropbox/GetReal/Data/sqlite")

### Make connection with database
getRealdb <- dbConnect(SQLite(), dbname="outcome_history.sqlite")


q1_langarts <- dbReadTable(getRealdb,"Q1_langarts_1617")

q1_langarts1516 <-dbReadTable(getRealdb,"Q1_lang_1516")



```


```{r}

grade_tbl <- with(q1_langarts,table(q1_langarts$grade))

pander(grade_tbl)

mean(q1_langarts$lang_avg)
```

```{r}

grades_q1 <- ggplot(q1_langarts, aes(x=lang_avg)) 
    grades_q1 + geom_histogram(fill="blue")

grades_q1_c <- ggplot(q1_langarts, aes(x=lang_avg))
        grades_q1 + geom_histogram(fill="blue") +facet_grid(~council) + labs(x="  Scores", title = "Pre: Healthy Relationships")



```



```{r}

grade_tbl_15 <- with(q1_langarts1516,table(langGrade))

pander(grade_tbl_15)

mean(q1_langarts1516$lang_pts)
```
